metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0311 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player through 13.0.0.262 and 14.x, 15.x, and 16.x through 16.0.0.287 on Windows and OS X and through 11.2.202.438 on Linux allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors, as exploited in the wild in January 2015.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0311` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.429ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.429ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.429ubuntu0.14.04.1').
